member.name: P:Tilde.MT.TranslationAPIService.Models.Translation.Domain
member.summary: The text domain of the translation system used to produce the translation. This property contain automatically detected domain if not specified within the request.

member.name: P:Tilde.MT.TranslationAPIService.Models.TranslationRequest.SrcLang
member.summary: The language of the source text. Two-byte languge code accordding to ISO 639-1.

member.name: P:Tilde.MT.TranslationAPIService.Models.TranslationRequest.TrgLang
member.summary: The language to translate text to. Two-byte languge code according to ISO 639-1.

member.name: P:Tilde.MT.TranslationAPIService.Models.TranslationRequest.Domain
member.summary: (Optional) Text domain of the translation system to use for producing the translation. The domain is going to be detected automatically if not specified.

member.name: P:Tilde.MT.TranslationAPIService.Models.TranslationRequest.Text
member.summary: Array of text segments to translate
